General.Name: NIBEC Co. Ltd
General.Description: NIBEC Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of tissue regeneration devices in South Korea. It offers peptide-based fusion products, regenerative biomaterials, cosmetics, and oral care products. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Jincheon-eup, South Korea.
General.Address: Iwol electricity-electronic Agro-Ind. Co, Jincheon-eup, South Korea, 27816
